name: Dileep Rao
description: American actor known for his roles in sci-fi and thriller films.

content.title: Biography
content.body: Dileep Rao was born in 1973 in Los Angeles, California. He graduated from the University of California, San Diego, and pursued a career in acting, performing in theater productions before transitioning to film.

content.title: Career
content.body: Rao's career took off with significant roles in major films such as *Avatar*, *Inception*, and *Drag Me to Hell*. Known for his aptitude in science fiction and thriller genres, he has portrayed characters that often provide critical plot developments. With a career spanning over a decade, Rao has become a recognizable face in high-profile cinematic projects.

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body: Rao has worked alongside well-known directors like James Cameron and Christopher Nolan. His role in *Inception* saw him collaborate with stars such as Leonardo DiCaprio and Ellen Page.

content.title: Legacy
content.body: Dileep Rao has made a mark in Hollywood with his selective and impactful roles, especially known for contributing to some of the highest-grossing films of the early 21st century. Despite a relatively small number of screen appearances, his ability to choose successful projects has made him a noteworthy figure in the industry.
